name: Scoretracer
tagline: A web scrapping project that scraps data from cricinfo.com to display the details of the latest matches ongoing
body:
### Welcome to SCORE TRACER's Page.
The web scrapping project scraps data from cricinfo.com.
It lists the matches that are currently ongoing for the user.
If the user selects a match then it displays the details about the match.
It displays the live scores for the user.
The scores gets updates.

###Team Size: 
2 members

###Team members:
Akshaya, Nivetha

###Scripting Language: 
Python 2.7.9

###Packages:
Beautifulsoup4, Configparser, Sys, Pynotify, Requests, Time

###IDE:
Sublime Text

### History
This project was developed as a part of my Internship selection process for the expert level training period.
The project was selected as the best project !!


### Authors and Contributors
Akshaya
Nivetha

### Support or Contact
Feel free to share your suggestions and doubts. 

"Knowledge not shared is knowledge ignored"
